thread.title: Sidelined by Democrats, Larry Lessig considers running against them
thread.title_full: Sidelined by Democrats, Larry Lessig considers running against them - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Sidelined by Democrats, Larry Lessig considers running against them
text: Five Democratic candidates for president are officially invited to tomorrow's CNN-sponsored debate in Las Vegas. Over the weekend, some of the network's reporters revealed cheeky plans to expand the debate, if needed: A clean, bubble-wrapped podium reserved for Vice President Joe Biden, should he decide to enter the race even one minute before the faceoff. [â€¦] ...
